member.name: IWICJpegFrameEncode.GetAcHuffmanTable
member.summary: Retrieves a copy of the AC Huffman table for the specified scan and table.
member.param: The zero-based index of the scan for which data is retrieved.
The index of the AC Huffman table to retrieve.
A pointer that receives the table data. This parameter must not be NULL.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The specified scan index is invalid.
Can occur if pAcHuffmanTable is NULL or if tableIndex does not point to a valid table slot. Check the scan header for valid table indices.

member.name: IWICJpegFrameEncode.GetDcHuffmanTable
member.summary: Retrieves a copy of the DC Huffman table for the specified scan and table.
member.param: The zero-based index of the scan for which data is retrieved.
The index of the DC Huffman table to retrieve.
A pointer that receives the table data. This parameter must not be NULL.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The specified scan index is invalid.
Can occur if pTable is NULL or if tableIndex does not point to a valid table slot. Check the scan header for valid table indices.

member.name: IWICJpegFrameEncode.GetQuantizationTable
member.summary: Retrieves a copy of the quantization table.
member.param: The zero-based index of the scan for which data is retrieved.
The index of the quantization table to retrieve.
A pointer that receives the table data. This parameter must not be NULL.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The specified scan index is invalid.
Can occur if pTable is NULL or if tableIndex does not point to a valid table slot. Check the scan header for valid table indices.

member.name: IWICJpegFrameEncode.WriteScan
member.summary: Writes scan data to a JPEG frame.
member.param: The size of the data in the pbScanData parameter.

member.name: IWICJpegFrameEncode
member.summary: Exposes methods for writing compressed JPEG scan data directly to the WIC encoder's output stream. Also provides access to the Huffman and quantization tables.
